articles.description: The 2017 champ has some spicy takes for the new 'Jeopardy!' hosts.
articles.content:
One of the biggest "Jeopardy!" champs of all time has strong thoughts on the new hosts -- especially the day-to-day guy, Mike Richards, ... whom he clearly thinks might not have been the best pick.

articles.title: Dolly Parton releasing album with her first novel, a thriller titled 'Run, Rose, Run,' in 2022 - USA TODAY
articles.description: Dolly Parton announced on Wednesday that she is co-authoring her first novel and releasing an album inspired by the book.
articles.content:
Dolly Parton announced this week that she is co-authoring her first novel next year – and releasing an album inspired by the book.
